description:
For some reason, Kyouko has an intense affinity for Jahy-sama, and keeps getting closer and closer.
Apparently the Boss has also taken a liking to her, and before Jahy-sama realizes, Kyouko is working at the pub as well.
Even though she`s quite fed up with this, Jahy-sama can`t help but show the newbie the ropes.
This leads to Kyouko`s affection for Jahy-sama increasing even further, fueling this vicious cycle even further.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La Patronne n`arrive pas à faire un choix !
